meanings.definition: The quality of being clear and easily understood.
meanings.sent1: Her perspicuousnesses in explaining complex ideas made the lesson easy to follow.
meanings.sent2: The perspicuousnesses of the instructions helped everyone complete the task without confusion.
meanings.sent3: The perspicuousnesses of the recipe made it impossible to mess up the dish.
meanings.sent4: His perspicuousnesses in guiding us through the maze of information were like a beacon in the fog.
meanings.sent5: The perspicuousnesses of her speech left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The state of being transparent or easily seen through.
meanings.sent1: The perspicuousnesses of the glass allowed us to see the beautiful view clearly.
meanings.sent2: The perspicuousnesses of the water made it easy to spot the fish swimming beneath the surface.
meanings.sent3: The perspicuousnesses of the plastic bag made it look like a ghost floating in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The perspicuousnesses of his intentions were as clear as crystal.
meanings.sent5: The perspicuousnesses of the window made the room feel bright and airy.
